title: Average attendance in the National Football League 2019
summary: In general Average attendance has stayed the same over the Year.

Average attendance is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, slightly increasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, and finally roughly constant from 2013 to 2014.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Average attendance, about 68397.0 was reported at Year 2013
The lowest Average attendance, of value 66957.0 was reported at Year 2010
